messages.subject: Re: Attention Artists
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nothing major. Just have it as a jpg file and let me know how you want it credited to you if you don t have your name/nickname/screenname whatever already
messages.messageBody:
Misery Mirror wrote:

> Are
>there any requirements for submitting an artwork?
>
>
>
Nothing major. Just have it as a jpg file and let me know how you want
it credited to you if you don't have your name/nickname/screenname
whatever already on it. And if there's a special caption or title you'd
like to have shown with it you can let me know that too.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Attention Artists
messages.msgSnippet: That s good to know. I tend to take days, sometimes even weeks to finish up one of my artworks. And lets not forget I need to take the actual time to
messages.messageBody:
That's good to know. I tend to take days, sometimes even weeks to finish up
one of my artworks. And lets not forget I need to take the actual time to
start...eh heh heh. ^_^;

But there's a Saitou image I'm working on that I think will be nice.... Are
there any requirements for sumbitting an artwork?


Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."



-------------------------



Misery Mirror wrote:

>Do we have to send in the stuff right away? Or will you accept artworks at
>any time?
>
>
>
Anytime at all. The entire ShinsengumiHQ is a continual work in
progress. I'm trying to add what I can when I can

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Attention Artists
messages.msgSnippet: I hope to get started on an art section for the website so if any of you would like to send me copies of your work that you d like included please feel free to
messages.messageBody:
I hope to get started on an art section for the website so if any of you
would like to send me copies of your work that you'd like included
please feel free to do so and let me know if you have any captions or
other info you'd like included.

Also if you know any non list members with Shinsengumi related art you
especially like please pass this info on to them as well.

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
